faq.helpText: Our team is here to help

documents.q: What documents do I need to provide to rent a car?
documents.a: A valid ID, a valid driver's license and a means of payment. Additional documents may be requested depending on the vehicle.

cancellation.a: Yes. Cancellation conditions vary depending on the reservation. We recommend canceling no later than 24 hours before pickup to avoid fees.

insurance.a: Basic insurance is included. You can choose a premium option for enhanced coverage according to your needs.

childSeat.q: Can I add a child seat?
childSeat.a: Yes, you can add a child seat when booking (subject to availability).

family.title: Comfort, space and tranquility
family.description: For your vacations or family outings, choose a spacious and comfortable vehicle. Air conditioning, storage and safety: everything is designed for a stress-free trip.

testimonials.description: Authentic reviews and a smooth rental experience, throughout Morocco.

reviews.sara: Clean car, fast service and excellent value for money. Perfect for a family trip.
reviews.youssef: Simple reservation, no waiting at pickup. The team is professional and very responsive.
reviews.khadija: Excellent comfort on the road, everything was as expected. I highly recommend!
reviews.omar: Very good experience overall. Support available and clear information.
reviews.nadia: Premium service, recent vehicles. We appreciated the assistance and flexibility.
